short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 20, 2023 at 1400 EDT. All bids submitted after 1400 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Parks Canada Agency, Banff Field Unit Visitor Experience requires the supply, delivery and offload of 15,000 Jumbo Toilet Paper Rolls per year commencing 2023. Term of contract is from date of award to December 31, 2023 with three (3) option years to extend the contract by one (1) year each. This tender opportunity is available on SAP Ariba: https://service.ariba.com/Discovery.aw/ad/viewRFX?id=15722516
description: Parks Canada Agency (PC) requires the supply, delivery and offload of 15,000 Jumbo Toilet Paper Rolls per year commencing 2023. Term of contract is from date of award to December 31, 2023 with three (3) option years to extend the contract by one (1) year each.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender

**Contract Title:** Jumbo Toilet Paper Rolls

**Contract Reference:** WS3859839440-Doc3859887850

**Category:** Goods and Services

**Invitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Notice Date:** 2023-04-05

**Submission Deadline:** 2023-04-20, 2:00 pm (EDT)

**Procurement Category:** General Department

## Description of Requirement

Parks Canada Agency, Banff Field Unit Visitor Experience requires the supply and delivery of Jumbo Toilet Paper Rolls. The contract term is from the date of the contract award to December 31, 2023, with three (3) one-year extension options.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Quantities:** 15,000 units per year
* **Contract Duration:** Year-long, with extension options
* **Contract Start Date:** Variable, based on contract award
* **Contract End Date:** December 31, 2023

## Trade Agreements

This contract is considered a NAFTA/Tented engagement with the following participating countries:

* Canada
* Chile
* European Union
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Supportive Information
This information can be obtained via the accredited SAP Ariba address of:

https://service.ariba.com/Discovery.aw/ad/viewRFX?id=15722516

**Contact Information**
Please reach out to Douglas Rachinski, for further information and guidance.

Email: douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Please refrain from contacting individuals unless you have successfully prequalified as a bidder for the procurement process. The procurement link is above to get full detailed information about the proposal.
I kept the information most relevant and omitted unnecessary fields, and rephrased it in a concise matter for  better readability. I avoided using transltriouly heavy long narrative about non-major sections which may be considered excess in your edit aim consideration hence respected the text original
